title: Waste treatment
text: Waste treatment refers to the activities required to ensure that waste has the least practicable impact on the environment

title: Functional Food
text: A functional food is a food claimed to have an additional function by adding new ingredients or more of existing ingredients.

title: Energy
text: In physics, energy is the quantitative property that must be transferred to a body or physical system to perform work on the body, or to heat it.

title: Research on Children with Special Needs
Entrepreneurship
text: Entrepreneurship is an act of being an entrepreneur, or 'the owner or manager of a business enterprise who, by risk and initiative, attempts to make profits'.
